      • configureDatabase

        private void configureDatabase(Server server,
                               java.lang.String connectionFile)
                        throws java.lang.Exception
        Ensure the database connection and required schemas.
        • QTFX system schema qtfx
        • One schema for each supported server, for instance qtfx_dkcp
        Parameters:
        server - The server.
        connectionFile - The connection file name.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - If any error occurs.
